attributes.action: admit what a bloody good bloke he is, despite his human faults.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some people may criticise the present Prime Minister, but we wish to recognise some of the good work that he has done over the past ten years in office and during his years as leader of the opposition. Tony Blair has had many successes which should not be overshadowed by more recent mistakes - some of which were not his fault. To this extent I would like to motion that the 19th of May becomes a public holiday in his honour and that this should be the day of his retirement.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
